interpretation: The dragon is a symbol of power and strength, representing a force to be reckoned with. It can also represent primal instincts and wild energy. When this card appears in a reading, it may indicate a need to tap into your own inner strength and courage. Alternatively, it may suggest that an outside force, such as a powerful person or situation, is influencing your life. Be mindful of your reactions and take control of your own power. Some associated keywords include: strength, power, primal, energy, force, courage, influence.
